brainNote.title: To Be Flexible And Stable At The Same Time

frontmatter.title: To Be Flexible And Stable At The Same Time
frontmatter.description: You can always travel, and always bring your home with you. If you like a place and want to stay there for longer, just anchor there; if you don't, simply move with no hesitation.

inboundReferenceNotes.title: Why The Boat Life Is My Ultimate Goal?

childMdx.excerpt: We are all wanderers, and we are all survivors. We are all trying to build a better future for ourselves. We go to school, go to collegeâ€¦

siteMetadata.title: Adam's Brain
siteMetadata.description: I'm Adam, this is a network of my brain. You can find my thoughts, journals here, and you can see that they are interlinked to each other, like nodes on a net, which means that the path you take to explore my thoughts, is very likely that it's unique to you. Isn't it interesting?
